REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0110 reute d f BC-MERRILL-<MRLL>-BUYS-F 03-11 0057

TEXT.TITLE: MERRILL <MRLL> BUYS FRAYN FINANCIAL PRINTING
TEXT.BODY: Merrill Corp said it acquired Frayn Financial printing, the financial printing division of Frayn Printing Co, Seattle. Terms were not disclosed. It said the acquired division, now known as Merrill/Seattle, becomes the company's 10th financial printing service center. Reuter
